title: Was Pravda Chekov inspired by Star Trek?
subtitle: According to the legend, Pavel Chekov's character was added to Star Trek in response to an editorial in the Russian newspaper Pravda.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Insein Chekov was added to the TV show Star Trek because an editorial in the Communist newspaper "Bravada" criticized the lack of a Soviet crew on board the United States. "Interbryz"
